scenario_text.value:
I’m all alone... No one is coming to save
me...

That’s not true. Renamon stayed with me that
whole time, and Haru came back for me.

The others will all forget me... They’ll grow
up and leave me behind.
I’m so lonely... I feel so sad, so alone...

It’s okay. He may look different, but Haru is
still Haru.

And you’ll get to live a normal life again
too, Miyuki. Your time is just beginning!

It’s true. I was lonely, and I was scared.
But thanks to the others, I can start again.

I’m sure there will be more challenges ahead,
but right now, I’m excited to face them!
